titleStmt.title: Regale necessarium, or, The legality, reason, and necessity of the rights and priviledges justly claimed by the Kings servants and which ought to be allowed unto them / by Fabian Philipps.
titleStmt.author: Philipps, Fabian, 1601-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
